name: TruePeopleSearch
description: Free people search engine providing access to public records including names, addresses, phone numbers, and associated individuals.
limitations: Data accuracy may vary. Some information may be outdated. Results are based on publicly available records.
legal_notes: This service aggregates publicly available information. Use in compliance with applicable privacy laws and terms of service.

name: FastPeopleSearch
description: Free people search directory offering access to public records, contact information, and address history for individuals in the United States.
limitations: Free service with basic information. Premium features may require payment. Data accuracy depends on source records.
legal_notes: Public records aggregation service. Use responsibly and in compliance with privacy regulations.

name: FamilyTreeNow
description: Genealogy and people search platform providing family tree information, historical records, and public record data for research purposes.
limitations: Focuses on historical and genealogical data. May not have current contact information for all individuals.
legal_notes: Genealogy and public records service. Information is derived from publicly available sources.

name: Radaris
description: People search and background check service providing access to public records, contact information, and social media profiles.
limitations: Free tier provides basic information. Advanced features require paid subscription. Some data may require verification.
legal_notes: Public records aggregation service. Premium features available for detailed background checks. Use in compliance with FCRA regulations.

name: Melissa Lookup
description: Data quality and people search API service providing address verification, phone validation, and people lookup capabilities.
limitations: Free tier has usage limits. Commercial use requires paid subscription. API rate limits apply.
legal_notes: Commercial data quality service. Requires account registration. Terms of service apply.

name: FOIA.gov
description: Official U.S. government portal for Freedom of Information Act requests, providing access to federal agency FOIA systems and request tracking.
limitations: FOIA requests may take time to process. Some information may be exempt from disclosure. Response times vary by agency.
legal_notes: Official U.S. government FOIA portal. All requests must comply with FOIA regulations and agency-specific requirements.

name: USAspending.gov
description: Official U.S. government spending database providing comprehensive information about federal spending, contracts, grants, and financial assistance.
limitations: Data may have processing delays. Some information may be redacted for security reasons. Historical data availability varies.
legal_notes: Official U.S. government transparency database. All data is publicly available and legally accessible.

name: SEC EDGAR
description: U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission's Electronic Data Gathering, Analysis, and Retrieval system providing access to corporate filings and financial disclosures.
limitations: Filings may have processing delays. Historical data may be limited. Some filings may require specific formats.
legal_notes: Official SEC database. All filings are publicly available as required by securities regulations.

name: FBI Crime Data Explorer
description: Federal Bureau of Investigation's crime statistics database providing access to national crime data, statistics, and law enforcement information.
limitations: Data reporting may have delays. Some information may be aggregated or anonymized. Historical data availability varies by jurisdiction.
legal_notes: Official FBI crime data portal. All data is publicly available and aggregated for privacy protection.

name: U.S. Census API
description: U.S. Census Bureau's application programming interface providing programmatic access to census data, demographic statistics, and geographic information.
limitations: API key required for access. Rate limits apply. Some datasets may have usage restrictions. Data updates follow census schedules.
legal_notes: Official U.S. Census Bureau API. Free API key required. All data is publicly available and aggregated for privacy.

name: PACER
description: Public Access to Court Electronic Records system providing online access to case and docket information from U.S. federal courts.
limitations: Registration required. Fees apply for document access. Some documents may be sealed or restricted. Search functionality has limitations.
legal_notes: Official federal court records system. Registration and payment required. All access is legal and authorized. Fees are set by the judiciary.

name: CourtListener
description: Free legal research website providing access to millions of opinions, oral arguments, and judicial records from U.S. federal and state courts.
limitations: Free tier has some limitations. API access requires registration. Some courts may not be fully covered. Data updates may have delays.
legal_notes: Free legal research platform. API available for registered users. All data is publicly available court records.

name: Justia State Courts
description: Legal research platform providing access to state court records, case filings, and legal documents from various U.S. state jurisdictions.
limitations: Coverage varies by state. Some states may have limited data. Free access may have restrictions. Premium features available.
legal_notes: Legal research platform. Free access to publicly available state court records. Premium features may require subscription.

name: Recap The People
description: Free PACER alternative providing access to federal court records and documents through crowdsourced contributions and automated collection.
limitations: Coverage depends on user contributions. Not all cases may be available. Data completeness varies. Relies on community contributions.
legal_notes: Free, crowdsourced court records platform. All documents are publicly available federal court records. Community-driven project.

name: UniCourt
description: Legal data and analytics platform providing access to federal and state court records, case analytics, and legal intelligence.
limitations: Free tier has limited access. API requires paid subscription. Some features may be restricted. Coverage varies by jurisdiction.
legal_notes: Commercial legal data platform. Free tier available. API access requires paid subscription. All data is publicly available court records.

name: Pushshift
description: Reddit search and analytics platform providing access to historical Reddit data, comments, submissions, and social media intelligence.
limitations: Service availability may vary. API rate limits apply. Some historical data may be incomplete. Free tier has limitations.
legal_notes: Reddit data aggregation service. All data is publicly available Reddit content. Use in compliance with Reddit's terms of service.

name: RedditSearch.io
description: Advanced Reddit search engine providing enhanced search capabilities for Reddit content, users, and discussions.
limitations: Search functionality may have limitations. Results depend on Reddit's API. Some features may require Reddit account.
legal_notes: Reddit search tool. All content is publicly available Reddit data. Use in compliance with Reddit's terms of service.

name: Sherlock Project
description: Open-source OSINT tool for finding usernames across hundreds of social networks, websites, and forums.
limitations: Requires Python installation. Some sites may block automated requests. Rate limiting may apply. Results depend on site availability.
legal_notes: Open-source OSINT tool. Use responsibly and in compliance with each website's terms of service. Only searches publicly available profiles.

name: Social Searcher
description: Social media search engine providing real-time search across multiple social networks including Twitter, Facebook, Instagram, and more.
limitations: Free tier has limited searches. API requires paid subscription. Some platforms may have restricted access. Rate limits apply.
legal_notes: Social media search platform. Free tier available. API access requires paid subscription. All searches use publicly available data.

name: YouTube Metadata Tools
description: YouTube platform and various third-party tools for extracting metadata, channel information, and video analytics from publicly available YouTube content.
limitations: YouTube's API has rate limits. Some metadata may require authentication. Third-party tools may have usage restrictions.
legal_notes: YouTube and third-party tools. All data is publicly available. Use in compliance with YouTube's terms of service and API policies.

name: VirusTotal
description: Free online service for analyzing suspicious files, URLs, domains, and IP addresses using multiple antivirus engines and threat intelligence sources.
limitations: Free tier has rate limits. API requires paid subscription for commercial use. Some features may be restricted. File size limits apply.
legal_notes: Cybersecurity threat intelligence platform. Free tier available for personal use. Commercial API access requires paid subscription.

name: Shodan
description: Search engine for internet-connected devices providing intelligence about servers, IoT devices, and network infrastructure.
limitations: Free tier has limited queries. API requires paid subscription. Some data may be restricted. Rate limits apply.
legal_notes: Internet intelligence search engine. Free tier available. Commercial use requires paid subscription. Use only for legitimate security research.

name: WHOIS Lookup
description: Domain registration lookup service providing WHOIS information, domain ownership details, and registration history for internet domains.
limitations: Some registrars may restrict WHOIS data. Privacy protection may hide owner information. Historical data may be limited.
legal_notes: Public WHOIS lookup service. All data is publicly available domain registration information. Privacy-protected domains may have limited data.

name: Censys
description: Cybersecurity search engine providing visibility into internet infrastructure, certificates, and connected devices for security research.
limitations: Free tier has limited searches. API requires paid subscription. Some data may be restricted. Rate limits apply.
legal_notes: Cybersecurity intelligence platform. Free tier available for research. Commercial use requires paid subscription. Use for legitimate security purposes only.

name: urlscan.io
description: Free URL and website scanner providing analysis of websites, screenshots, and security information for threat intelligence and research.
limitations: Free tier has rate limits. Some scans may take time. API requires registration. Some features may be restricted.
legal_notes: Free URL scanning service. API available for registered users. All scans are publicly available. Use responsibly and ethically.

name: Google Maps
description: Comprehensive mapping and geospatial platform providing satellite imagery, street view, directions, and location intelligence.
limitations: API requires key and has usage limits. Free tier has restrictions. Some features may require payment. Rate limits apply.
legal_notes: Google Maps platform. Free access available. API requires key and may have usage fees. Terms of service apply.

name: Google Earth
description: 3D mapping and satellite imagery platform providing detailed geographic visualization and historical imagery analysis.
limitations: Some features may require desktop application. Historical imagery availability varies. High-resolution data may have restrictions.
legal_notes: Google Earth platform. Free access available. Some features may require account. Terms of service apply.

name: OpenStreetMap
description: Open-source, collaborative mapping project providing free, editable map data and geographic information worldwide.
limitations: Data quality varies by region. Some areas may have incomplete coverage. Community-maintained data may have inconsistencies.
legal_notes: Open-source mapping project. Free and open data. Open Database License applies. Contributions welcome.

name: Flightradar24
description: Real-time flight tracking service providing live aircraft positions, flight history, and aviation intelligence worldwide.
limitations: Free tier has limited features. API requires paid subscription. Some data may be delayed. Coverage varies by region.
legal_notes: Flight tracking service. Free tier available. Commercial API access requires paid subscription. All data is publicly available flight information.

name: MarineTraffic
description: Real-time vessel tracking service providing live ship positions, maritime intelligence, and port information worldwide.
limitations: Free tier has limited features. API requires paid subscription. Some data may be delayed. Coverage depends on AIS reception.
legal_notes: Maritime tracking service. Free tier available. Commercial API access requires paid subscription. All data is publicly available AIS information.

name: Have I Been Pwned
description: Free service for checking if email addresses or passwords have been compromised in data breaches, providing breach intelligence and credential verification.
limitations: Free API has rate limits. Some features may require paid subscription. Database may not include all breaches. Results are based on reported breaches.
legal_notes: Breach intelligence service. Free tier available. Commercial API access requires paid subscription. Use only for legitimate security and verification purposes.

name: DeHashed
description: Data breach search engine providing access to compromised credential information for security research and verification purposes.
limitations: Paid service required. API access requires subscription. Some data may be restricted. Results depend on breach database coverage.
legal_notes: Commercial breach database service. Paid subscription required. Use only for legitimate security research and verification. Unauthorized access using compromised credentials is illegal.

name: IntelTechniques Tools
description: Collection of free OSINT tools and resources for online investigations, privacy research, and intelligence gathering.
limitations: Tool availability may vary. Some tools may have usage restrictions. Free resources may have limitations.
legal_notes: Free OSINT tools collection. All tools are publicly available. Use responsibly and in compliance with applicable laws and terms of service.

name: Maltego
description: Interactive data mining and link analysis tool for OSINT investigations, providing graph-based visualization of relationships and connections.
limitations: Free Community Edition has limitations. Commercial features require paid license. Some transforms may be restricted. Learning curve required.
legal_notes: Commercial OSINT tool. Free Community Edition available. Commercial licenses available. Use only for legitimate investigations and research.

name: OSINT Framework
description: Collection of OSINT tools and resources organized by category, providing a structured approach to open-source intelligence gathering.
limitations: Tool availability may vary. Some links may be outdated. Community-maintained resource. Tool quality varies.
legal_notes: Free OSINT framework. Community-maintained collection of tools. Use responsibly and verify tool legality before use.

name: Zillow
description: Real estate platform providing property information, ownership details, sales history, and property estimates for U.S. properties.
limitations: Some data may be estimated. Property information may not be complete. Historical data availability varies. Some features may require account.
legal_notes: Real estate platform. Free access to publicly available property information. Commercial use may require API access. Terms of service apply.

name: County Assessor Offices
description: U.S. county assessor offices provide public access to property records, tax assessments, and ownership information through various online portals.
limitations: Access varies by county. Some counties may have limited online access. Data formats vary. Historical records may be limited.
legal_notes: Public county records. All information is publicly available property and tax data. Access methods vary by jurisdiction.

name: SEC Company Filings
description: U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission database providing access to corporate filings, financial statements, and company information for publicly traded companies.
limitations: Only covers publicly traded companies. Filings may have processing delays. Historical data may be limited. Search functionality has limitations.
legal_notes: Official SEC database. All filings are publicly available as required by securities regulations. Free access to all public company information.

name: OpenCorporates
description: Open database of corporate information providing access to company data, corporate structures, and business intelligence from jurisdictions worldwide.
limitations: Free tier has limited API access. Premium features require paid subscription. Coverage varies by jurisdiction. Some data may be incomplete.
legal_notes: Corporate intelligence database. Free access available. API requires paid subscription for commercial use. All data is publicly available corporate information.

name: State Business Registrations
description: U.S. government portal providing links to state business registration databases and secretary of state offices for corporate entity searches.
limitations: Access methods vary by state. Some states may require registration. Data formats differ across jurisdictions. Historical records may be limited.
legal_notes: Official U.S. government portal. Links to state-specific databases. All information is publicly available business registration data.

name: State Court Portals
description: National Center for State Courts directory providing access to state court websites and online case management systems across U.S. jurisdictions.
limitations: Access varies by state. Some states may require registration or fees. Online access may be limited for older cases. Data formats vary.
legal_notes: Official state court portals. All records are publicly available. Access requirements vary by jurisdiction. Some states may charge fees for document access.

name: State Legislature Databases
description: National Conference of State Legislatures directory providing access to state legislative websites, bill tracking systems, and legislative records.
limitations: Access methods vary by state. Some states may have limited online access. Historical records may be incomplete. Search functionality varies.
legal_notes: Official state legislative portals. All legislative records are publicly available. Access methods and data formats vary by state.

name: County Records Portals
description: U.S. county government portals providing access to property records, tax assessments, marriage records, and other county-level public records.
limitations: Access varies by county. Some counties may have limited online access. Data formats differ. Historical records may be incomplete.
legal_notes: Public county records. All information is publicly available. Access methods and data formats vary by county jurisdiction.

name: State Vital Records
description: Centers for Disease Control directory providing links to state vital records offices for accessing birth, death, marriage, and divorce certificates.
limitations: Access requirements vary by state. Some records may require proof of relationship. Fees may apply. Historical records may be limited.
legal_notes: Official state vital records offices. Access requirements and fees vary by state. Some records may have privacy restrictions.

name: Realtor.com
description: Real estate platform providing property listings, sales history, property details, and neighborhood information for U.S. properties.
limitations: Some data may be estimated. Property information may not be complete. Historical data availability varies. Some features may require account.
legal_notes: Real estate platform. Free access to publicly available property information. Commercial use may require API access. Terms of service apply.

name: Redfin
description: Real estate platform offering property information, sales data, market trends, and neighborhood analytics for residential properties.
limitations: Coverage may vary by market. Some data may be estimated. Historical data may be limited. Some features may require account registration.
legal_notes: Real estate platform. Free access to publicly available property and market data. Terms of service apply.

name: Trulia
description: Real estate search platform providing property information, neighborhood data, crime statistics, and school information for residential properties.
limitations: Some data may be aggregated or estimated. Crime statistics may have reporting delays. School information may not be current. Coverage varies by area.
legal_notes: Real estate platform. Free access to publicly available property and neighborhood data. Terms of service apply.

name: Dun & Bradstreet
description: Business intelligence platform providing corporate data, credit information, and business intelligence for companies worldwide.
limitations: Paid service required. Free access is very limited. API access requires subscription. Some data may be restricted. Coverage varies by region.
legal_notes: Commercial business intelligence platform. Paid subscription required for full access. API available for enterprise customers. Terms of service apply.

name: Bloomberg Terminal
description: Professional financial data and analytics platform providing comprehensive corporate intelligence, financial data, and market information.
limitations: Expensive subscription required. Access limited to professional users. Requires specialized hardware. Learning curve for effective use.
legal_notes: Professional financial data platform. Paid subscription required. Primarily for institutional and professional users. Terms of service apply.

name: Crunchbase
description: Business intelligence platform providing startup and company data, funding information, and corporate intelligence for technology and startup companies.
limitations: Free tier has limited access. Premium features require paid subscription. API access requires paid plan. Some data may be incomplete.
legal_notes: Business intelligence platform. Free tier available. Premium features and API access require paid subscription. Terms of service apply.

name: Google Earth Pro
description: Advanced desktop application providing high-resolution satellite imagery, historical imagery, and advanced geospatial analysis tools.
limitations: Requires desktop installation. Some features may require account. Historical imagery availability varies. High-resolution data may have restrictions.
legal_notes: Free desktop application. Some features may require Google account. Terms of service apply. Use in compliance with applicable laws.

name: Mapbox
description: Mapping and location platform providing custom maps, geocoding, routing, and location intelligence APIs for developers and applications.
limitations: Free tier has usage limits. API requires key and may have fees. Some features may require paid subscription. Rate limits apply.
legal_notes: Mapping platform. Free tier available. API requires key and may have usage fees. Terms of service apply.

name: Bellingcat Toolkit
description: Collection of OSINT tools and resources curated by Bellingcat for investigative journalism, fact-checking, and open-source research.
limitations: Tool availability may vary. Some tools may have usage restrictions. Free resources may have limitations. Community-maintained.
legal_notes: Free OSINT toolkit. All tools are publicly available. Use responsibly and in compliance with applicable laws and terms of service.

name: First Draft News
description: Journalism training and verification resources providing tools and guides for fact-checking, verification, and investigative journalism.
limitations: Resources may be updated periodically. Some tools may require registration. Training materials may have access restrictions.
legal_notes: Journalism training and verification resources. Free access available. Use responsibly and ethically for legitimate journalism and research purposes.

name: BreachDirectory
description: Free data breach search engine providing access to compromised credential information for security research and verification purposes.
limitations: Database coverage may vary. Some breaches may not be included. Results are based on reported breaches. Free service may have limitations.
legal_notes: Free breach search service. Use only for legitimate security research and verification. Unauthorized access using compromised credentials is illegal.

name: Snusbase
description: Data breach search engine providing access to compromised credential databases for security research and credential verification.
limitations: Paid service required. Database coverage may vary. Some data may be restricted. Results depend on breach database coverage.
legal_notes: Commercial breach database service. Paid subscription required. Use only for legitimate security research and verification. Unauthorized access using compromised credentials is illegal.

name: LeakCheck
description: Data breach monitoring and credential verification service providing access to compromised credential information for security purposes.
limitations: Free tier has limited searches. API requires paid subscription. Database coverage may vary. Some features may be restricted.
legal_notes: Breach monitoring service. Free tier available. API access requires paid subscription. Use only for legitimate security research and verification.

name: FlightAware
description: Real-time flight tracking service providing live aircraft positions, flight history, and aviation intelligence for commercial and private aircraft.
limitations: Free tier has limited features. API requires paid subscription. Some data may be delayed. Coverage varies by region. Private aircraft may have limited tracking.
legal_notes: Flight tracking service. Free tier available. Commercial API access requires paid subscription. All data is publicly available flight information.

name: ADS-B Exchange
description: Community-driven flight tracking service providing unfiltered aircraft tracking data and flight information from ADS-B receivers worldwide.
limitations: Coverage depends on community receivers. Some areas may have limited coverage. Data quality varies by region. API may have rate limits.
legal_notes: Community-driven flight tracking service. Free access available. API available for registered users. All data is publicly available ADS-B information.

name: VesselFinder
description: Real-time vessel tracking service providing live ship positions, maritime intelligence, and vessel information for commercial and private vessels.
limitations: Free tier has limited features. Premium features require paid subscription. Some data may be delayed. Coverage depends on AIS reception.
legal_notes: Maritime tracking service. Free tier available. Premium features require paid subscription. All data is publicly available AIS information.
